00005 #ifndef __SSEPLUS_EMULATION_SSE3_H__
00006 #define __SSEPLUS_EMULATION_SSE3_H__
00007 
00008 #include "../SSEPlus_base.h"
00009 #include "../native/SSEPlus_native_SSE3.h"
00010 #include "../arithmetic/SSEPlus_arithmetic_SSE3.h"
00011 #include "SSEPlus_emulation_comps_SSE3.h"
00012 
00019 SSP_FORCEINLINE
00020 __m128 ssp_dp_ps_SSE3( __m128 a, __m128 b, const int mask )                 
00021 {
00022     const static __m128i mulShiftImm_0123 = SSP_CONST_SET_32I( 0x010000, 0x020000, 0x040000, 0x080000 );   // Shift mask multiply moves 0,1,2,3 bits to left, becomes MSB
00023     const static __m128i mulShiftImm_4567 = SSP_CONST_SET_32I( 0x100000, 0x200000, 0x400000, 0x800000 );   // Shift mask multiply moves 4,5,6,7 bits to left, becomes MSB
00024 
00025     // Begin mask preparation
00026     ssp_m128 mHi, mLo;
00027     mLo.i = _mm_set1_epi32( mask );                                 // Load the mask into register
00028     mLo.i = _mm_slli_si128( mLo.i, 3 );                         // Shift into reach of the 16 bit multiply
00029 
00030     mHi.i = _mm_mullo_epi16( mLo.i, mulShiftImm_0123 );   // Shift the bits
00031     mLo.i = _mm_mullo_epi16( mLo.i, mulShiftImm_4567 );   // Shift the bits
00032 
00033     mHi.i = _mm_cmplt_epi32( mHi.i, _mm_setzero_si128() );    // FFFFFFFF if bit set, 00000000 if not set
00034     mLo.i = _mm_cmplt_epi32( mLo.i, _mm_setzero_si128() );    // FFFFFFFF if bit set, 00000000 if not set
00035     // End mask preparation - Mask bits 0-3 in mLo, 4-7 in mHi
00036 
00037     a = _mm_and_ps( a, mHi.f );                                       // Clear input using the high bits of the mask
00038     a = _mm_mul_ps( a, b );
00039 
00040     a = ssp_arithmetic_hadd4_dup_ps_SSE3( a );                            // Horizontally add the 4 values
00041     a = _mm_and_ps( a, mLo.f );                                      // Clear output using low bits of the mask
00042     return a;
00043 }
00044 
00049 #endif // __SSEPLUS_EMULATION_SSE3_H__
